title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.7 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-4.7 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations

The school shall retain all records of test results, lead remediation plans, determinations that a building is lead-free, and waiver requests, for ten years following the creation of such documentation. Copies of such documentation shall be immediately provided to the Department, local health department, or State Education Department, upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
67-4.7

Adopted

New

York State Register May 9, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 19, eff. 5/9/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
